data.name: CapLinked
data.type: Virtual Data Room
data.tagline: Intelligent and easy-to-use tools to help you share files with confidence.

description.main: CapLinked is one of the highest quality data rooms on the market. They offer a breadth of features and are one of the most fairly priced data rooms as well. CapLinked also stands out when considering the customizability of the data room and the workflow. The company has only been around since 2010 and they do not have a large track record of reviews or a profile with the BBB. However, they do offer fantastic resources on their website and have a very responsive team managing their customer service, so expect high quality service as a user. CapLinked also integrates with top enterprise software, like Salesforce CRM, Dropbox, and Google Drive, and even allows for custom integration. CapLinked is a strong product in almost every aspect, including security, reporting, customization, and ease of use.

pricing_plan_bullets.name: 24/7 Customer Support
pricing_plan_bullets.definition: No matter your account size or plan, ShareFile offers free support and training for you, your team, even your clients. Our U.S.-based Customer Care team is available 24/7 by phone or email to answer any questions or fix any issues that may arise. Or if you’d just like to search online, our Knowledge Base and Community Forum offer hundreds of articles, videos and ongoing conversations to help you get answers faster.

pricing_plan_bullets.name: Custom Branding
pricing_plan_bullets.definition: We brand your ShareFile account to match the look and feel of your company’s logo, website and colors. That way, it shows off your brand, not ours — everything from the login page to the headers, colors and other details of your account can match your website or logo.

pricing_plan_bullets.name: Feedback & Approvals Workflow
pricing_plan_bullets.definition: Simplify collaboration with a secure way to collect feedback and get approvals with no confusing email threads. Manage notifications and reminders, even set deadlines—all in one place.

pricing_plan_bullets.name: Unlimited Client Users
pricing_plan_bullets.definition: Need to send or give access to files to people — clients, vendors, customers and others — outside your company? Wish those same people could access and use certain features in your account? With ShareFile, you can share files and folders with as many people as you want at no additional charge.

pricing_plan_bullets.name: Multifactor Authentication
pricing_plan_bullets.definition: Multi-Factor Authentication uses your phone or another device to provide an extra layer of security for new device logins. Available for both client and employee users, this feature sends a verification code via text message (SMS) or voice call after you enter your password to ensure that only you can access your account, even if your password has been compromised.

pricing_plan_bullets.name: Mobile Apps
pricing_plan_bullets.definition: With ShareFile Mobile Apps — available for all iOS, Android, Windows and Blackberry devices — you get seamless access to all the files, folders and features of your account on the go. Whether you need to browse, send, request files or set folder permissions, you can do so right on your smartphone or tablet. You can even edit Microsoft Office files or annotate PDFs.

pricing_plan_bullets.name: Co-editing
pricing_plan_bullets.definition: Co-edit and co-author files directly in your browser any time and on any device with convenient Microsoft Office 365 integration (Office 365 license required).

pricing_plan_bullets.name: Sync
pricing_plan_bullets.definition: A native application available for both Mac and Windows, ShareFile Sync automatically synchronizes a local folder on your computer with folders in your ShareFile account in real time. It’s the easiest way to keep files instantly up to date on all of your devices.

pricing_plan_bullets.name: Desktop Widget
pricing_plan_bullets.definition: Why bother opening a Web browser for simple tasks? ShareFile Desktop App lets you upload, download, send and request files right from your desktop. Focused on speed and convenience, this app is a flexible way to manage your ShareFile account with drag-and-drop functionality, keyboard shortcut support, native interactions and adjustable windows.

pricing_plan_bullets.name: Activity Logs
pricing_plan_bullets.definition: Offering a simple way to track folder-by-folder activity, these reports are easy to read and export. You can see exactly who has done what and when — and you can even break out information by folders or their subfolders.

pricing_plan_bullets.name: Versioning
pricing_plan_bullets.definition: Have lots of people collaborating on a single file and worried that changes might get lost? File versioning lets you keep and view every single previous version of a file when a new one is uploaded with the same name. With this feature, any files with the same name automatically save as the latest version, with the option to view earlier versions.

pricing_plan_bullets.name: FTP
pricing_plan_bullets.definition: ShareFile is compatible with most well-known FTP clients, enabling you to connect your ShareFile account directly from an FTP program. It’s a great way for you and your clients to upload or download files to or from a secure location while using your existing FTP programs.

pricing_plan_bullets.name: Third Party Integrations
pricing_plan_bullets.definition: ShareFile integrates with many of the tools you already use — including Microsoft Office 365, Basepin, DocAuto, FotoIN, Gmail, Trumpet, BidPlanroom, Redtail, Fujitsu ScanSnap and more.

pricing_plan_bullets.name: E-Signature Integration
pricing_plan_bullets.definition: Citrix RightSignature seamlessly integrates with ShareFile. For an additional fee, you can send files stored in your ShareFile account to others for secure, legally binding electronic signature. With RightSignature, you pick where recipients need to sign or initial, and the simple, easy-to-use interface ensures that documents get every field filled completely. Once signed, documents are saved automatically back to ShareFile, so you never have to follow up with clients or chase down documents again.

pricing_plan_bullets.name: Mobile editing
pricing_plan_bullets.definition: Within the ShareFile Mobile App, you can edit any Microsoft Office document, spreadsheet or presentation and annotate any PDF — right on your smartphone or tablet. You can even make files available offline for editing when you don’t have an Internet connection and save them with all of the changes once you do. It’s on-the-go work that works.

pricing_plan_bullets.name: Email Plugin
pricing_plan_bullets.definition: The ShareFile Plugin for Microsoft Outlook allows you to insert links to files, upload and send new files, and request files directly from Microsoft Outlook email messages. You can have ShareFile convert all attachments (or just attachments over a certain size) to ShareFile links to avoid email bounce back or annoying file-size restrictions.

data.name: SecureDocs
data.type: Secure File Sync & Sharing Platform and Virtual Data Room
data.tagline: Your Virtual Data Room from Start Up to Exit...

description.main: SecureDocs is a powerful virtual data room that keeps an emphasis on simplicity. This simplicity also extends to SecureDocs' flat rate pricing model, which starts at $250 / month. They also offer price breaks for committing to a longer contract or to organizations using a high volume of project spaces. Even with a simple interface and straight-forward pricing, SecureDocs is top-tier in terms of security, with key security features like two-factor authentication, watermarking, and strong user permission options.
description.reviews: SecureDocs receives overwhelmingly positive reviews across a number of different review sites with users touting their superior customer service and slick interface. SecureDocs also used to be a division of Appfolio, a leader in property management software with an A+ BBB rating. So while SecureDocs does not yet have a rating on BBB, customer reviews across the web demonstrate that they adhere to the same quality of service that Appfolio offers.
description.features: SecureDocs' feature offering is mainly focused around security and ease of use, for example, their customizable NDAs and customizable permissions. Even thought SecureDocs isn't packed with features, they are compliant with HIPAA regulations and use extremely secure data centers. This compliance, extreme security, and ease of use make them a great option for several industries, including life sciences, investment banking, and private equity.
description.industriesuses: SecureDocs offers scalable virtual data room solutions with transparent pricing. Their solution fits particularly well with the needs of the technology, life sciences, investment banking, venture capital and law industries, but it can truly be used for businesses in any industry. SecureDocs' product is also designed with specific features to assist companies in many different situations, including Sell-Side M&A, Buy-Side M&A, Raising Capital, Rights Issues, Strategic Partnerships, IPOs.
description.security: SecureDocs is a contender to be one of the most secure data room products on the market. The company uses certified Amazon Services data centers which are ISO 27001 certified, offer SOC 1, 2, & 3 reports and are proteced by a number of physical security measures. They also provide a large number of features focused on providing maximum security to their clients. Any data sent, received, or stored with SecureDocs is encrypted using top-of-the-line encryption standards. They also include two-factor authentication and detailed activity reports to monitor user activity.
description.reporting: SecureDocs is not the leader in terms of reporting / analytics, however, they do report a sufficient amount of useful analytics information. SecureDocs keeps an audit log which tracks all user activity, along with timestamps. Furthermore, they make it very straightforward to export and email the audit log to data room administrators. Once the data room is no longer needed, administrators can zip and download data room files for reference later.
description.service: SecureDocs is very easy to use, so a support-based onboarding process is not necessary and they do not provide a dedicated onboarding specialist. However, they do offer 24/7 online and phone support if users have questions or need help with the product. They do not have online chat, which means you'll have to contact them via email or over the phone.
